description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Kill the demons, absorb their blood for powerups!  Lil' Demons: Splatter includes Wave Survival and King of the Hill game modes, piles of weapons, and supports multiple 3D rendering modes including anaglyph glasses.  All for just 80 points!  NEW! v1.1 adds a new gametype, Knockoff, as well as a whole mess of tweaks to make it even better!
